notFound.title: Oops!
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
notFound.description: Looks like this page was baked a little too long and is no longer available. But don’t worry, we have many other treats waiting for you.

home.title: Freshly baked
home.subtitle: every day
home.description: Discover the authentic taste of our artisanal breads, homemade cakes, and freshly ground coffee. Every product is made with love and the finest ingredients.
home.location: Plaça dels Jardins d'Alfàbia, 5, Nou Barris.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Each product is made with fresh ingredients and traditional techniques to offer you the best gastronomic experience.

about.title: Our History
about.description: My Bakery was born from the dream of sharing the authentic flavor of traditional baking. Since 2000, we've been serving our community with fresh products made from recipes passed down through generations.
about.footer: We believe that good food brings people together, and every day we work to create special moments through our breads, pastries, and exceptional coffee.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Do you have a question or want to place a special order? We're here to help.

address.label: Address
address.value: Plaça dels Jardins d'Alfàbia, 5, Nou Barris.

footer.description: Welcome to our bakery. We offer fresh, artisanal bread and pastries every day.
